Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review the performance metrics provided by the QA Tester.
Analyze performance metrics and identify areas for optimization in the game; focus on memory usage and loading times.
Contact @Producer and @QA Tester to discuss current performance issues and gather additional data.
Wrap up analysis and draft a report on findings with actionable items.
Meet with @UI/UX Designer to align on user feedback and discuss proposed UI changes.
Start refining UI designs based on user feedback and optimize for different screen sizes.
Document the changes made and prepare for next day's implementation work.
